cat <<'EOF'

Help for SQL bundle

The runSQL command takes the selected text and submit it as a query to mysql. It assumes that the mysql command line program is already in your $PATH. Using the --html flag the output from the query is formated and displayed in an HTML window. The runSQL command assumes the following environment variables are properly set:

  • $MYSQL_USER No default
  • $MYSQL_PWD No default
  • $MYSQL_HOST defaults to localhost if not set
  • $MYSQL_PORT defaults to 3306 if not set
  • $MYSQL_DB No default
These variables may be set in the parent shell of TextMate, global varialbes in TextMate preferences, or as project local variables. EOF
